mapper.select:
SELECT sd.id, sd.delivery, sd.plant, sd.shipToParty, sd.nameOfShipToParty, sd.deliveryDate, sd.item, sd.material, sd.deliveryQuantity, sd.salesUnit, sd.status, sd.create_by, sd.update_by, sd.create_time, sd.update_time, sd.delete_flag FROM sudn sd
left join md_product_packaging pp on pp.product_no = sp.material and pp.delete_flag = 0
WHERE sp.delete_flag = 0
